name: Guests Arrive at the Church
description: Please plan to arrive early to ensure seating.

additionalInfo.title: Early Arrival
additionalInfo.subtitle: Please plan to arrive early to ensure seating.

additionalInfo.title: Bilingual Service
additionalInfo.subtitle: The service will be conducted in both Spanish and Polish.

additionalInfo.title: Phone Policy
additionalInfo.subtitle: Kindly refrain from using your phone during the ceremony.

name: Church Ceremony
description: Traditional Catholic wedding with readings, vows, and blessings.

additionalInfo.title: Traditional Ceremony
additionalInfo.subtitle: Traditional Catholic wedding with readings, vows, and blessings.

additionalInfo.title: After Ceremony
additionalInfo.subtitle: Dried flower petals will be provided for a festive exit. Note: Rice is not allowed.

name: Group Photo Session
description: Quick group photo with all guests after the ceremony.

name: Transport to Reception
description: Organized transport will take guests from the church to the reception venue.

additionalInfo.title: Shuttle Service
additionalInfo.subtitle: Organized transport will take guests from the church to Finca Casa Luna.

name: Cocktail Hour
description: Enjoy drinks and tapas while mingling.

additionalInfo.title: Spanish Tapas
additionalInfo.subtitle: The cocktail hour is a time to socialize before the seated dinner. Tapas include regional specialties like Iberian ham and seafood.

name: Couple's Photo Session
description: Join in for memorable group shots while enjoying the cocktail hour.

additionalInfo.title: Photo Opportunity
additionalInfo.subtitle: Feel free to join in for memorable group shots while enjoying the cocktail hour.

name: Seated Dinner & Toasts
description: Multi-course dinner featuring local Spanish cuisine.

additionalInfo.title: Spanish Dining
additionalInfo.subtitle: In Spain, the dinner is a long affair, so take your time and savor each course. Guests will be served wine and other beverages throughout the meal.

additionalInfo.title: Menu Options
additionalInfo.subtitle: Featuring local Spanish cuisine with fish, meat, and vegetarian options, followed by wedding cake.

name: First Dance & Dance Floor
description: The newlyweds' first dance followed by open dance floor.

name: Bouquet Toss & Games
description: Traditional bouquet toss followed by interactive games with guests.

name: Late Night Snacks
description: Hot small bites and pizza will be served.

name: End of Celebration
description: The celebration will finish at 3:00 AM.
